attributes.action: Resign from TAFTA/TPP negotiations until an in-depth, independent, multi-stakeholder analysis is done.
attributes.additional_details: The UK is currently engaged in closed-door negotiations with the EU and America about the future trade agreement known as TAFTA/TPP. Evidence for the benefits of this trade deal are not conclusive and the UK Government should make an independent, in-depth, multi-stakeholder analysis before any decision is made to take part in the deal.
